Reviews.Content: im surprised jamison hotel mixed reviews stay jamison hotel stayed 6 7 times business value money luxury hotels sydney cbd stayed hotel 5 read comments tripadvisor booked march 2010 extremely nervous maybe quality slipped worried hotel partner experience top quality flew uk live 6am staff extremely flexible friendly helping check facilities hotel help settle journey london walked reception spoke staff hotel lost service lovely walk nervous wouldnt clean maybe amazing luxury bathrooms 7 ago hadnt maintained shouldnt worried looked pretty brand including carpets walls bedding furniture bathroom etc quality clean spacious remembered spa nice stayed mid week fairly quiet day staffed suited fine chill peace food opinion breakfast dinner remember quality nice service feel bad tripadvisor perfect experience jamison hotel ok 5 star hotel quality taste decor modern service cleanliness top rate opinion pay alot similar standard hotels sydney standards arent easy please partner stay leading hotels world affiliated hotels world cost 23 times night jamison charges fundamentally hotel apart details service 5 star hotel offers base sydney weve stayed cost 800 night weve complain sheets clean bathrooms mould service poor rude food sent reservations messed etc whilst feel bad guests whove perfect stay question grain salt expectations begin mistakes happen hotels travel hotel city continent happen overall past continue future recommend jamison hotel sydney
